paragraph.heading: 1Code generation
paragraph.paragraph: All actions taken in the diagram tool that modify a part of the system are immediately reflected in the Eiffel system. Following is a summary of these actions.

When removing a cluster, the associated directory is not erased, but the reference to the cluster is removed from the Ace file. At this time, it is not possible to create a cluster using the diagram tool, only to remove one.
